title: Jordan Peterson on Religious Axioms and the Divided World Part 1
description:
Part 1 of looking at Part 4 of Jordan Peterson's Easter Video https://youtu.be/xPIanlF6IwM 

Link to Part 2 of this 2 Part Video https://youtu.be/qvWHODDj4jQ

He begins the video noting two ways to perceive the world, as a space of objects or a forum for action. We arrive at this divorce partly because of the relationship between material and story which  in the Hebrew story relates to the poles of sacrifice and text. 

Jordan Peterson answering What is religion at Lafayette https://youtu.be/V32WHDuy-Do 

John Walton on text and authority https://youtu.be/6RDAbu0KDwM

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
